char_info.char_desc: The Siren Who Swims at Fast Speeds

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Even though I'm a youkai-born, I promise I'll resolve this crisis.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm hoping just to find a solution. I could otherwise be lucky here...
Do you think the greatest minds may work on a solution?

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: There's somebody. This situation has been unpleasant, and I need to rid myself of my excessively long hair.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Will the restoration of myself be epic?

t_scene_info.speaker: Kagami:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You won't likely know who are the real youkai people...

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Both of you are sirens? Who's the one that just showed up?

t_scene_info.speaker: Kisumi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: That's my daughter. She took me here via time traveling to swim in this river...

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I don't understand why the Bamboo Forest of the Lost has a river to begin with.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: But what's going on? Her hair's shorter than yours.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kagami:
t_scene_info.dialogue: We're from a different time period, so we're not affected by this.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Everyone in Gensokyo seems to have been affected, but I still retain my abilities.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kagami:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I have a list of individuals I want to unleash my danmaku on.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Oh, not now! I'm on my way to the Palace of Eternity!

t_scene_info.speaker: Kisumi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: We don't want any interruptions from you.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: If you don't leave, it's a game of danmaku!

t_scene_info.speaker: Kagami:
t_scene_info.dialogue: We will just be as glad to not have our hair fall out during this!
